LanguageData.Bullet_HellsphereCannonGun.label: 지옥구 포탄
LanguageData.Gun_HellsphereCannon.label: 지옥구체 대포
LanguageData.Gun_HellsphereCannon.description: A ultra-high-power energy pulse projector designed for siegebreaking. The hellsphere cannon must hold a bead on its target for several seconds while charging, before it releases a devastating tsunami of power. The explosion is capable of melting concrete in its blast radius. The heat of the explosion will ignite anything nearby. It cannot fire at close-up targets.
LanguageData.Gun_HellsphereCannon.tools.barrel.label: 총열
